  "description": "Transsion Holdings is the parent company of TECNO, Infinix, and itel, and a leading smartphone manufacturer in Africa and emerging markets. With a focus on innovation tailored to local needs, Transsion also manages accessory, appliance, and after-sales brands like Oraimo, Syinix, and Carlcare.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Recruiter
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are looking for a seasoned Executive Recruiter to handle senior-level hiring across our organization.
	This role requires discretion, strong stakeholder management, and the ability to source and close top executive talent.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage full-cycle recruitment for executive roles.
	Work closely with senior leaders to understand role requirements.
	Source and engage high-caliber candidates through targeted search and networking.
	Conduct in-depth candidate assessments and present shortlists.
	Maintain confidentiality throughout the process.
	Negotiate offers and manage onboarding coordination.
	Keep accurate records in the ATS and provide hiring updates.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree (Master&rsquo;s preferred).
	A minimum of 5 years in recruitment, with 3 at least years focused on executive hiring.
	Experience in multinational or fast-paced environments, ideally tech or consumer goods.
	Strong sourcing and assessment skills.
	Excellent communication and confidentiality.
	Familiarity with ATS platforms.
	HR certification is an added advantage.





What We Offer


	Salary: N500,000 - N700,000 Monthly.
	Opportunity to work with global brands (TECNO, Infinix, itel, Oraimo, etc.)
	Dynamic and multicultural team
	Career growth and development opportunities
	Competitive compensation and benefits


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;sandra.russel@transsion.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Business Development Manager Job at Maineflow Limited




        
    

        
        Maineflow Limited is a Microfinance institution providing Mcro-lending, leasing, and financial inclusion services to small businesses, individuals, and organizations across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a strategic Business Development Manager to drive growth. This role demands a proven leader who can attract capital from High Net Worth Individuals (HNIs), design innovative financial products, manage our credit portfolio, and strengthen strategic partnerships.
	A true business leader, someone who can confidently engage HNIs, develop products, manage credit, and lead teams to deliver measurable growth and lasting impact.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and launch innovative financial products using mobilized funds.
	Manage and grow the company’s credit portfolio while minimizing defaults.
	Mobilize significant capital from HNIs in Nigeria and the diaspora.
	Build and maintain trust-based relationships with HNIs, partners, and stakeholders.
	Drive overall business strategy, partnerships, and market expansion.
	Lead teams and ensure alignment of initiatives with company objectives.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s in Finance, Business, or related field; MBA/CFA preferred
	7–15 years in senior business development, fundraising, or executive roles.
	Strong track record of raising capital from HNIs/investors.
	Experience in product development and credit portfolio management.
	Extensive network in Nigeria’s HNI and financial sector.
	Exceptional leadership, negotiation, and communication skills


Benefits


	Negotiable Salary, depending on experience (DOE)
	Up to 5% net commission on business generated.
	Comprehensive benefits (health & pension) upon confirmation.
	Leadership growth and advancement in a fast-expanding institution.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a tailored cover letter highlighting relevant experience and achievements to: redberylmanagementconsulting@gmail.com using "Business Development Manager – [Your Name]" as the subjectof the mail.

Note


	Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so early submission is strongly encouraged.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
